listings.title: Billing Specialist
listings.content: We are a mid-sized law firm in downtown Seattle currently recruiting for a Billing Specialist. This position works closely with all departments in our firm to ensure that all invoices are submitted in a timely and accurate manner. This is a fast-paced position and requires strong organizational, as well as communication skills. The successful candidate will be a self-starter, detail oriented, able to work efficiently and balance multiple tasks within time constraints.
listings.author: Bob

listings.title: Grooming Specialist
listings.content: Exceptional attention to detail Ability to effectively organize work and manage time, Ability to work within tight deadlines, Ability to work independently and in teams
listings.author: Bob
